name: False Awakening: Mercy Hills Early Build
name_original: False Awakening: Mercy Hills Early Build
description:
Demo for playtesting various features:

Movement: Left Stick

Camera Control: Right Stick

Yes/Action: Square(PlayStation) /X Button(Xbox) 

No: Triangle(PlayStation)/Y Button(Xbox)

Use Showers to replenish your health

Check Map/Task: R1(Playstation) RB(Xbox)
